mean_cn: n. 【眼科】白内障，大瀑布，暴雨，洪水，奔流；  v. 倾注
mean_en: a condition in which a part of your eye (called the lens) becomes cloudy and you cannot see well
sentence: She had an operation to remove the cataract that was blocking her vision.
sentence_trans: 她做手术去除阻碍视线的白内障。
word_etyma: cata向下 ＋ ract冲 → 向下冲 → cataract大瀑布
